.. math::

	& z^{r}\\
	& r z^{r - 1}\\
	& r z^{r - 2} \left(r - 1\right)\\
	& r z^{r - 3} \left(r - 2\right) \left(r - 1\right)\\
	& r z^{r - 4} \left(r - 3\right) \left(r - 2\right) \left(r - 1\right)\\
	& r z^{r - 5} \left(r - 4\right) \left(r - 3\right) \left(r - 2\right) \left(r - 1\right)\\
	& r z^{r - 6} \left(r - 5\right) \left(r - 4\right) \left(r - 3\right) \left(r - 2\right) \left(r - 1\right)\\
	& r z^{r - 7} \left(r - 6\right) \left(r - 5\right) \left(r - 4\right) \left(r - 3\right) \left(r - 2\right) \left(r - 1\right)\\
